column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Special occasion or just a night out on the town
column2: Bavette's is an excellent option. In fact all of the Hogsalt restaurants are good to great. I've dined in for birthdays
column3: NYE and to satisfy random steak cravings. Service is consistently attentive and friendly. Certainly one of the best steakhouses in Chicago. Bartenders are top notch too. I vouch for the deliciousness of everything I photographed.
